name: EduVenture
description: EduVenture is a game/study tool made by members of the Digital Media Lab at UW Whitewater. This game was inspired by Quizlet and the mobile apps Temple Run and Dash Quest. Players are able to save their own custom quizzes and play them in the game. In the game, players must defeat 3 enemies to gather their answers, then will encounter a boss fight. To defeat the boss, the player must answer a quiz question from they quiz they picked to play.
